abstract: When the auction moved from bankruptcy court to behind closed doors, the Monarch group of lenders was in the lead with a $308.1 million bid.
snippet: When the auction moved from bankruptcy court to behind closed doors, the Monarch group of lenders was in the lead with a $308.1 million bid.
lead_paragraph: Several bidders squared off on Tuesday in Federal Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan in an all-day auction of Blockbuster, the long-struggling video-rental pioneer.

headline.main: Final Bidders for Blockbuster Include Icahn and Dish

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
